Frequently Asked Questions

What is trust certification?

Trust certification is a document that verifies the existence and key details of a trust for financial institutions.

Which financial institutions accept your certifications?

Our certifications are designed to be universal and compatible with all major banks, investment firms, and financial institutions.

Is the AI tool available now?

The AI-powered tool is currently in development. You can sign up for early access notifications.
